ok lol make it 4169 and put the case under case 185:[br][size=1]Posted on: June 22, 2007, 11:03:52 AM[/size][hr] case 185: //clicking most buttons int actionButtonId = misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 0, packetSize); switch(actionButtonId) { case 4169: //charge spell if(playerLevel[6] > 79) { if(charge < 201) { charge = 400; sendMessage("You feel charged with a magical power!"); stillgfx(308, absY, absX); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } else { sendMessage("Your current charge is too powerful!"); } } else { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 80 to cast this spell!"); } break;

some thing like that?

item.title: Small error in one of my codes! please i really need help!
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Ok look guys, this isn’t an error as in something isn’t right but, ive compiled it, and its fine, no error or nothing, but when i come to try it out on my server, its just not working… its the spell charge… here is the code.

case 21: //charge spell
if(playerLevel[6] > 79) {
if(charge < 201) {
charge = 400;
sendMessage(“You feel charged with a magical power!”);
stillgfx(308, absY, absX);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
} else {
sendMessage(“Your current charge is too powerful!”);
}
} else {
sendMessage(“You need a magic level of 80 to cast this spell!”);
}
break;

}
}

I dont know whether the last 2 brackets are part of the code or not, but whats wrong with that?.. there is no errors when i compile it…

anyone help me plz?

Read full topic
